title: Sekai De Yuiitsu No (Shinken Zukai) Na No Ni Senryokugai To Yobareta Ore, Kakusei Shita (Shinken) To Saikyou Ni Naru
alternative_title: 世界で唯一の【神剣使い】なのに戦力外と呼ばれた俺、覚醒した【神剣】と最強になる ; I, the Only [Divine Sword User] in the World, Was Expelled and Became the Strongest With the Awakened [Divine Sword]
status: 世界で唯一の【神剣使い】なのに戦力外と呼ばれた俺、覚醒した【神剣】と最強になる ; I, the Only [Divine Sword User] in the World, Was Expelled and Became the Strongest With the Awakened [Divine Sword]
description:
Description :
        Albert...Commonly known as Al, is a adventurer in murphin.He is also the only one in the world who is a , a job that no one else has.But this job is too weak.It is neither particularly strong nor useful.Although he had a divine sword, its attack power was only 1!The guild master forcefully expelled him from the guild.Al is at a loss, but he can't get a job because of the rumors that are spreading in the town.He has no choice but to go hunting for monsters, and defeats the first one.From there, the cheat-like performance of the  begins to blossom.He also develops the town he moved to, which was in shambles.This is the story of Al who becomes the strongest with the cheat ability of the , develops the town from the bottom to the "strongest", and makes his name known around the world.
